entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:28 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
